amendment.description: To prohibit the Council on Environmental Quality and the Environmental Protection Agency from promulgating rules or guidance that bans hydraulic fracturing in the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3105 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 42. Record Vote Number: 323.

action.text: Amendment SA 3105 proposed by Senator Cramer. (consideration: CR S6212-6213; text: CR S6212) To prohibit the Council on Environmental Quality and the Environmental Protection Agency from promulgating rules or guidance that bans hydraulic fracturing in the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3105 proposed by Senator Cramer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3105 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 42. Record Vote Number: 323.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3105 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 42. Record Vote Number: 323.
